stimulusHtml: Which of the following is true about Dr. Copelandâ€™s study?

features.html: Dr. Copeland is interested in studying how diet impacts the nervous system activity of professional dancers. She randomly assigns a group of professional ballet dancers to either a protein-rich diet or a carbohydrate-rich diet. After three weeks on each food plan, she measures the function of specific parts of the brain and nervous systems while they are dancing.

choicesHtml: Dr. Copeland is conducting an experiment.
Dr. Copeland is conducting a case study.
Dr. Copeland is using meta-analysis to test her hypothesis.
Dr. Copeland is using a correlational method.
